definitions: the construction or repair of ditches

examples.text: they would have to pay for hedging and ditching

definitions: the action of getting rid of or giving up something

examples.text: the ditching of traditional ballot-box elections

shortDefinitions: action of getting rid of or giving up something

definitions: the action of ending a relationship with someone peremptorily

examples.text: she has not recovered from his ditching of her in favor of Anna

shortDefinitions: action of ending relationship with someone peremptorily
